backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing complaint submission, storage, access control, and prioritization logic with role checks and lifecycle metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature removals to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a custom OKLCH color palette and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Setup guide outlining prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for running the Civic Lens frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, identity handling, user role loading, and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component integrating Internet Identity with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Inactive modal component for collecting a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Displays before and after photos for a complaint with status‑based badges and pending placeholders.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Metadata card showing complaint priority, deadline badge, timestamps, location, and reporter info.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Displays a destructive badge showing how long ago a complaint was escalated.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Handles image upload with preview, validation, and removal for complaint submissions.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Renders a priority badge with icon and label based on urgency score.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Shows SLA time remaining or an overdue badge depending on due date and status.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Form allowing users to confirm resolution, give a rating, and submit feedback for a complaint.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with navigation links, auth handling, header, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, login flow, and context state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating complaints, user roles, and statuses via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Displays a citizen’s submitted complaints with status, priority, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Form for authenticated users to submit a new civic complaint with photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Shows full complaint details with admin status update actions, photos, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Documentation page showing prerequisites and setup steps for running the project.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page explaining the app and showing calls to action based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Displays escalated complaints for higher officials, handling admin checks, loading states, and rendering complaint cards with priority and escalation info.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Renders the official dashboard with tabs for open and in‑progress complaints, including admin validation, loading handling, and complaint management links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, architectural notes, and overall Civic Lens build status.
